alert.note: Alert for Beaufort; Craven (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 09 at 4:46PM EDT until May 09 at 5:15PM EDT by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 515 PM EDT FOR NORTHWESTERN CRAVEN AND SOUTHWESTERN BEAUFORT COUNTIES... At 446 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Vanceboro, or 15 miles southeast of Ayden, moving southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... New Bern, River Bend, Vanceboro, Askins, Cayton, Fort Barnwell, Jasper, Tuscarora, Wilmar, Ernul and Cove City. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Please send your reports of hail and/or wind damage, including trees or large limbs downed, by calling the National Weather Service office in Newport at 1-800-889-6889.
